dmca.title: Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement

________________________________

From: Design By Joyce [mailto:joyce@designbyjoyce.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, October 17, 2006 5:10 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement
Subject: Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement



Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement 

To: Andrea Almeida, c/o The Planet.com
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207
(214) 782-7800

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Signed, Joyce A. Himes

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. Signed, Joyce A. Himes

Joyce A. Himes, Glendale, Arizona, (623) 694-7947 (please keep private),
joyce@designbyjoyce.com <mailto:joyce@designbyjoyce.com>   (home address
if necessary available upon request)

The contact for the allegedly infringing party, to the best of my
knowledge is,

Charles T. Winters
3665 Maine Avenue
